name: Weakened
description:
All your [Weapon] and [Spell] power is decreased by 5.
If you have {effect:might:Might} when you gain Weakened, you remove Might instead of gaining Weakened.

name: Burning
description: You lose 2 Wounds (fire) at the start of the turn of the creature that inflicted Burn.

name: Bleeding
description:
If you (willingly) move during your turn, you immediately lose 1 Wound (blood loss).
You lose 1 Wound (blood loss) at the start of the turn of the creature that inflicted Bleeding.

name: Vulnerability
description:
All direct damage you suffer is increased by 5.
If you have {effect:protection:Protection} when you gain Vulnerability, you remove Protection instead of gaining Vulnerability.

name: Crippled
description: If your Movement is higher than 2, it becomes 2. You cannot {power:disengage:Disengage}.

name: Chilled
description:
If your Movement is higher than 2, it becomes 2. You cannot {power:disengage:Disengage}.
You cannot use Quick actions (you can use Quick actions as Standard actions if you want) or make Opportunity Attacks.
